attributes.action: Give Volodymyr Zelenskyy an honorary knighthood for services to democracy.
attributes.additional_details: President Zelenskyy has shown immense courage and fortitude in standing up to the unprovoked invasion by Russian forces. He is fighting not just for the benefit of Ukraine but the benefit of everyone in Europe and the West against an aggressive warmonger with far superior fire power but far inferior morals and character.
attributes.background: The UK needs to recognise the immeasurable contribution that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has made to the Western ideas of freedom, democracy and the right to self determination.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
